patient_info: Compulsive behaviors,Delayed speech and language development,Poor suck,Postnatal growth retardation,Infantile muscular hypotonia
golden_diagnosis: Prader-Willi 综合征/Prader-Willi syndrome; PWS/Prader-Willi syndrome/Prader-Willi syndrome,Prader-Willi 综合征/Prader-Willi syndrome; PWS/Prader-Willi syndrome/Prader-Willi syndrome,Prader-Willi 综合征/Prader-Willi syndrome; PWS/Prader-Willi syndrome/Prader-Willi syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Pervasive Developmental Disorder Not Otherwise Specified (PDD-NOS)
2. Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD)
3. Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
4. Intellectual Disability
5. Genetic Syndromes with Delayed Development and Muscle Hypotonia (e.g., Down Syndrome, Fragile X Syndrome)
6. Cerebral Palsy
7. Mitochondrial Disorders (e.g., Mitochondrial Myopathy, Leigh Syndrome)
8. Metabolic Disorders (e.g., Phenylketonuria, Galactosemia)
9. Infections or Illnesses with Developmental Delay as a Consequence (e.g., Cytomegalovirus, Toxoplasmosis)
10. Congenital Hypotonia (e.g., due to chromosomal abnormalities like Trisomy 18 or genetic mutations like TBX1)
